summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirty-third Avenue, from the north line of Leschi Heights Addition to the south line of Leschi Heights Addition, by grading, curbing and sidewalking the same, and by constructing water mains therein; also East Terrace Street from Thirty-second Avenue to the east line of Leschi Heights Addition by grading, curbing, sidewalking, and by constructing water mains and sewers therein, all in the City of Seattle, Seattle; all in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 31805 of the Records of the City Comptroller of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
